column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Have a slice here and you can see why Chicago is known for their deep dish pizza. Yum! Being from the West Coast
column2: nothing in California comes close. Here
column3: you order sausage on your pizza
column4: you get little specs of sausage meat balls here and there
column6: you get a layer of sausage on your pizza! I'm itching to go back :D
